category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ENABLE_invoke_system_handlers
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to enable/disable invoke-system-rule and invoke-system-action workflow handlers. Valid values are YES/NO. YES (which is the default setting) - Enables these handlers and are displayed in handler selection dialog. NO - Disables these handlers and will not be displayed in handler selection dialog.
